trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Bowling Green
There were no other sightings in Bowling Green on or around July 8th 2009
divs: sighting details17 y\o son and i were sitting on north-facing deck of home and saw cream white solid colored oval object moving very slowly from ssw to nne in straight line. there was no sound and no navigation or strobe lights observed. height was probably less than 3000 feet.
Summary: White, cream-colored oval slowly moving ssw to nne,no sound, straightline.
